pages.text: The $(item)quern$() is used to crush things in TFC. It's made of two parts: The $(thing)handstone$() and the $(thing)base.$()
This is a quern without it's handstone.
pages.name: The Quern

pages.text: Make this, and place it on the ground. The stone types don't have to match.
pages.title: Quern Base

pages.text: Make this, and right click to put it on the quern.
pages.title: Quern Handstone

pages.text: To use the quern, right click with the item you want to crush on top. Then, right click the little handle to turn the wheel. Then, right click the base to retrieve your crushed item.

Some examples of useful quern recipes:$(br2)Rocksalt -> Salt$(br)Kaolinite -> Kaolinite Powder$(br)Graphite -> Graphite Powder$(br)Flowers -> Dye$(br)Grain -> Flour$(br)Olive -> Olive Paste$(br)Cinnabar -> Redstone$(br)Cryolite -> Redstone$(br)Kimberlite -> Diamond$(br)Ore -> Powder$(br)Bone -> Bonemeal$(br)Limestone -> Gypsum$(thing)$(br)This list is incomplete.$()
